common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]You are [VAR TRNAME(0000)]—no!
You\r
are\r
the\r
artist\r
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]-garde![VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_04:
Each time I recall our artistic battle, I’ve found
myself wishing to face you once again...[VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_05:
I am so very glad that you are here! Praise
Mother Nature![VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_06:
I had planned to meet with the Top Champion
today, but I have just now canceled that plan!\r
Shall we instead talk of art together?[VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_07:
What? You came in the Top Champion’s stead?
Well, I cannot be bothered by that.[VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_08:
I don’t care what the reason is—if we can make
a masterpiece together once more, then fine![VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_09:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Well then, [VAR TRNAME(0000)], are you
ready\r
to\r
open\r
wide\r
a\r
door\r
to the world of art?[VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_retry:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Greetings, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Are you
ready\r
to\r
open\r
wide\r
a\r
door\r
to the world of art?[VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_10:
Avant-garde! Very well, then. Let us head to
my studio.[VAR 0114(0017)]
common_2020_kusa_010_kusa_11:
Not avant-garde! I simply cannot contain my
excitement to face you in battle once more.\r
Come back as soon as you are able![VAR 0114(0017)]
